title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around        A typical paddler prepares for his journey to the Obed river.       Carpooling and Vanpooling is encouraged and welcomed at the Obed Wild and Scenic River.  However, there are no carpools or vanpools provided by the staff of the park to any destination within the park.  Nevertheless, several local paddling enthusiasts are often available to run shuttles.  Please stop by the Obed Visitor Center at 208 North Maiden Street in downtown Wartburg, or call 423-346-6294, to obtain information on possible shuttles.     When driving along the roads that traverse the Obed Wild and Scenic River, please use caution.  Many of the roads are narrow and steep, with a multitude of curves.  Maintain a safe driving speed and obey all posted traffic regulations.
